verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> I was glad <S%H8056><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> to me, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Our feet <S%H7272><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> your gates, <S%H8179><s%> O Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is built <S%H1129><s%> as a city <S%H5892><s%> that is compact <S%H2266><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%>

Where <S%H8033><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up, the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3050><s%> to the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
For there <S%H8033><s%> are set <S%H3427><s%> thrones <S%H3678><s%> of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> the thrones <S%H3678><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the peace <S%H7965><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> they shall prosper <S%H7951><s%> that love <S%H157><s%> you.
Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within your walls, <S%H2426><s%> and prosperity <S%H7962><s%> within your palaces. <S%H759><s%>
For my brothers <S%H251><s%> and companions' <S%H7453><s%> sakes, <S%H4616><s%> I will now <S%H4994><s%> say, <S%H1696><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within you.
Because <S%H4616><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> your good. <S%H2896><s%>
